siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.
blogPost.body: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.
blogPost.title: Homeroom - Personalized short-form learning for moving up in tech
blogPost.author: Erik Spangenberg

localize.description: 每周，我们都会为你找到下一篇最好读的文章，让你在工作中获得更好的发展。在我们的移动应用中，你会与不同公司中与你的角色相同的人进行分组，他们都在阅读同样的东西。功能方便点对点的亲密学习。
localize.tagline: 个性化的短板学习，让你在技术上更上一层楼

localize.description: 每週，我們都會爲你找到下一篇最好讀的文章，讓你在工作中獲得更好的發展。在我們的移動應用中，你會與不同公司中與你的角色相同的人進行分組，他們都在閱讀同樣的東西。功能方便點對點的親密學習。
localize.tagline: 個性化的短板學習，讓你在技術上更上一層樓

previous.excerpt: The project aims to provide tools to use during the development process. Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder texts, custom color dummy images, and videos of different sizes. Use generated content to test the layout until the real content arrives. Give it a try!
previous.title: ipsm.io - Collection of productivity tools for developers & designers

localize.description: 该项目旨在提供开发过程中使用的工具。生成不同大小的Lorem Ipsum占位文本、自定义颜色的虚拟图像和视频。使用生成的内容来测试布局，直到真正的内容到达。试试吧
localize.tagline: 开发者和设计师的生产力工具集

localize.description: 該項目旨在提供開發過程中使用的工具。生成不同大小的Lorem Ipsum佔位文本、自定義顏色的虛擬圖像和視頻。使用生成的內容來測試佈局，直到真正的內容到達。試試吧
localize.tagline: 開發者和設計師的生產力工具集

next.excerpt: Coder moves software development to your cloud, centralizing an organization's development initiatives and unlocking substantial gains in both developer velocity and enterprise security.
next.title: Coder - The developer workspace platform

localize.description: Coder将软件开发移至云端，集中组织的开发计划，并在开发人员速度和企业安全方面获得巨大收益。
Coder將軟件開發移至雲端，集中組織的開發計劃，並在開發人員速度和企業安全方面獲得巨大收益。
